episodes.title: The Western Book of the Dead
episodes.plot: A bizarre murder brings together three police officers and a career criminal in the corrupt city of Vinci, California.

episodes.title: Night Finds You
episodes.plot: Ray, Ani, and Paul are assigned to Casper's murder case. Frank tries to keep his business deals going, even after Caspere's death.

episodes.title: Maybe Tomorrow
episodes.plot: Paul works the prostitute angle; Frank receives the first casualty in a secret war.

episodes.title: Down Will Come
episodes.plot: The detail works a pawn shop lead to close in on a suspect in the Caspere case. Frank revisits his past to pay for the present.

episodes.title: Other Lives
episodes.plot: Ray and Frank consider new life choices; Ani and Paul go up to the coast to follow a lead.

episodes.title: Church in Ruins
episodes.plot: Desperate to locate a missing woman with intel about Caspere, Frank meets with Mexican drug dealers; Ani infiltrates an exclusive inner circle, with Ray and Paul keeping close tabs.

episodes.title: Black Maps and Motel Rooms
episodes.plot: As Ani, Paul, and Ray get closer to finding out the truth about Caspere, circumstances become more dangerous for them all and everyone around them. Frank deals with an inside betrayal, learns important information, and plans his next move.

episodes.title: Omega Station
episodes.plot: Ray and Ani attempt to escape their desperate situation while Frank ties up some loose ends.
